name: Account Activity
description: Account Activity events report when specific user account management tasks are performed, such as a user account is created, changed, deleted, renamed, disabled, enabled, locked out or unlocked.

3.name: Password Change
3.desc: An attempt was made to change an account's password.

4.name: Password Reset
4.desc: An attempt was made to reset an account's password.

8.name: Locked Out
8.desc: A user account was locked out.
